body:
Comment 2: 
The resolution is to make more memory available to the build. We know some of the test
cases consume large amounts of ram. As iant says, running the tests on your machine is
nice, but not crucial as we have good coverage from the builders.

I'm going to make this as a duplicate of issue #4617 which contains some steps to reduce
footprint of the compiler.
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #4617._
